summary: The story of a former boxer who quits boxing following a fallout with the authorities over the underlying politics but goes on to coach a fisherwoman to fulfill his dream through her.
cast: Madhavan|Ritika Singh|Mumtaz Sorcar|Nassar|Radha Ravi|Zakir Hussain|Kaali Venkat|Baljinder Kaur|Bipin|Olympic Devarajan|Zakir Hussain|Talib Mehdi|M.K. Raina|Ashiqa Salvan|Raj Sharma|Ravindra Vijay
title: Saala Khadoos
